Hi Annette,

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia

full_threads.body:
Hi Team,


Pls add the following to the specific area where we see the Title Education and short bio.
Sonia should be positioned directly after Carol CEO. Then Chloe then Carly.


We are missing Carly's education, it was there before we updated her title. Likewise for Camilla.
(did you need me to resupply)?


Also pls update Chloe's title to Senior HR Leader




New Copy below: and see attached Image.
Sonia Dal


Senior HR Leader


Education
Master of International Business - University of Melbourne
Graduate Diploma Human Resource Management & Industrial Relations - University of Melbourne

Prosci Change Management certified

Qualified Mediator




Sonia is a seasoned Human Resources professional with over 20 years of expansive experience in Human Resources, Employee Relations, Change Management, and Wellbeing.

Throughout her career, she has held senior HR leadership positions in both the private and public sectors across the Asia-Pacific region, including Australia, New Zealand, and Singapore.
Sonia's diverse industry background encompasses financial services, retail, healthcare, technology, telecommunications, construction, education, federal government, recruitment, and not-for-profit organisations.


A passionate advocate for enhancing the employee experience, Sonia is dedicated to helping individuals and businesses reach their full potential. She has successfully implemented strategic HR initiatives that promote engagement, performance, and wellbeing, creating workplaces where people can thrive.
Her commitment to fostering inclusive environments and developing talent has been instrumental in driving organisational success throughout her career.


Thank you
